column4: does anyone else have the latest linux kernel as: 2.6.20-13 but the latest linux restricted modules as 2.6.20-12 thus rendering restricted-modules uninstallable?
(in feisty)
can someone please tell me if there is a linux-restricted-modules-2.6.20-13-generic package anywhere???
please?
there is no -13- package yet
- but i have a 2.6.20-13 kernel... and i can't install linux-restricted-modules-generic because it depends 2.6.20-13
no rants please. Just 'echo a4 | sudo tee /etc/papersize'
will that fix firefox?  every other application prints A4 fine
ah, so your original information was misleading
no it wasn't I said that it was a firefox issue
which firefox version?
if your /etc/papersize already contains a4, then that command obviously won't help
yeah it is A4, I just checked
firefox2 was ignoring system settings on papersize, but firefox 3 doesn't -- at least not here (just checked)
it appears to change to A4, but as soon as I print, it goes back to US paper
this is a fresh install of ubuntu 8.04...
changed the value to paper, I'll print and see waht happens, thanks
you changed it to paper? :)
i changed value of paper, sorry
that fixed it, thank you
thank Jowi
